attributes.action: Stop car park operators ripping us off at railway stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since car parkign at most stations was contracted out, charges have risen by up to 300%.

My ticket is £11 to get to work but the cost of parking is a whopping £6.60 - I am trying to be green but it now costs me twice as much to get the train as to drive. Like many people I live too far away to walk or cycle and there are no buses to the station until the middle of the day.

This is not a recipe for encouraging people out of their cars!
